fields.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
fields.description: An open-world action-adventure game set in the land of Hyrule.

fields.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
fields.description: An action RPG set in a fantasy world with a rich story and deep gameplay.

fields.title: Minecraft
fields.description: A sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made of blocks.

fields.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
fields.description: An action-adventure game set in the late 1800s American frontier.

fields.title: God of War (2018)
fields.description: An action-adventure game that follows Kratos and his son as they navigate the world of Norse mythology.

fields.title: Among Us
fields.description: A multiplayer party game where players work together to complete tasks and find an imposter.

fields.title: Hades
fields.description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler set in the Greek underworld.

fields.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
fields.description: A life simulation game where players develop and customize their own island paradise.

fields.title: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout
fields.description: A battle royale game where players compete in a series of chaotic mini-games.

fields.title: Overwatch
fields.description: A team-based shooter with a diverse cast of characters and abilities.

fields.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
fields.description: An action-adventure game set in Sengoku-era Japan with challenging combat.

fields.title: Death Stranding
fields.description: An open-world game with a focus on exploration and connecting isolated communities.

fields.title: Persona 5
fields.description: A JRPG that combines dungeon crawling with life simulation elements.

fields.title: The Last of Us Part II
fields.description: An action-adventure game with a strong narrative set in a post-apocalyptic world.

fields.title: Celeste
fields.description: A platformer that challenges players with tight controls and a touching story.
